content: Hi All, is it possible to validate custom XML based document with custom .SCH schematron though this validation in .NET ?

For dotnet issues with the fhirclient, there is a specific stream for it
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/dotnet
That being said, the .net validator doesn't use the schematrons included, it uses the more detailed fhir structure definition resources.
(which includes all invariants and terminology bindings that aren't i the schematrons)
